title: FS or FT: T206 Cobb (bat off shoulder) SGC40
author: square5000

posts.post_title: FS or FT: T206 Cobb (bat off shoulder) SGC40
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Cobb for sale. It is his 'bat off shoulder' pose. The card has been graded Very Good by SGC.

Card edges have damage (maybe rubber bands?). There are a couple of wrinkles over Cobb's bat. The lithographic printing is a bit off. Otherwise a very nice card with no major creases.

I will ship via priority mail with insurance.

$925 postpaid if paying by Paypal
$900 postpaid if paying by check or money order

Also, open to trading, give or take some cash. Looking for these cards in particular:
T206 Walter Johnson portrait
T205 Ty Cobb
T204 Keeler Good
T204 Tinker 
T204 Brown
1915 Cracker Jack Tris Speaker
N172 Radbourn standing, standing w/bat pose, portrait (Fair/Poor with nice image)

Please contact me for references or questions.

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
[url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]
square5000 on eBay
